power.title: Astral Wasp
power.fluff: A crystalline wasp with gossamer wings appears next to your foe and stings it, then buzzes about, waiting for another opening to attack anyone

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an astral wasp that appears in 1 square within the target's space. It lasts until the end of your next turn.

The wasp's square is hazardous terrain that deals damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus to anyone who enters it. The squares adjacent to the wasp are difficult terrain.
If the target moves out of the astral wasp's square, it takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Blinding Vapors
power.fluff: You point your implement at the ground, and acid boils up to envelop your target in a caustic haze

power.title: Burning Hands
power.fluff: A gout of flame erupts from your hands and scorches nearby foes, some of whom try to evade the flames by dropping down

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target must succeed on a saving throw or drop prone.

power.title: Charm of Misplaced Wrath
power.fluff: You bend your foe's mind, filling it with wrath even as you twist its senses

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You slide the target up to 3 squares. The target is then dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free reaction. It has a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Chill Strike
power.fluff: You hit your foe with a bolt of frigid energy, reducing its ability to act for a moment

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage and cannot take opportunity actions.

power.title: Conduit of Ice
power.fluff: You turn your enemy into a conduit to an ice storm from the Elemental Chaos

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and you create a zone of frost in a burst 2 centered on the target.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is knocked prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You create a zone of frost in a burst 1 centered on the target.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The zone lasts until the end of your next turn, and moves with the target.

Squares in the zone are difficult terrain for all creatures other than you, including flying creatures. Any enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Active Familiar:
section.text: While your familiar is inside the zone, it knocks prone any enemy that ends its turn in the zone.

power.title: Darkening Flame
power.fluff: You toss a blazing sphere of shadow-infused fire against your enemies, that blackens both flesh and soul when it detones

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire and necrotic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude or Will, your choice, until the end of your next turn. You make this choice once and it applies to all targets.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains vulnerable to radiant equal to your Wisdom modifier. The vulnerable applies to the first Radiant attack against the target before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Dread Presence
power.fluff: Your shadow lengthens and grows, looming over your enemies and overcoming them with dread

part.keyword: Arcane, Fear, Implement, Necrotic, Nethermancy, Zone

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d18 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of dread shadows that lasts until the end of your turn.
Any enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. An enemy under a Fear effect takes an additional +5 damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: The damage from this power and the zone it creates ignore the first 5 points of resist necrotic the target has.

power.title: Empowering Lightning
power.fluff: Green and yellow lightning twines around your implement, then part of it flashes toward your enemy and explodes in a shower of sparks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus lightning damage, and you push the target half the distance.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain an effect depending on your Arcane Implement Mastery. If you do not have this feature, you gain no benefit. You must use the benefit before the end of the encounter, or it is lost.

section.name: Orb of Deception:
section.text: When you use your orb of deception, the target of the triggering attack you missed takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your orb's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Orb of Imposition:
section.text: When you use your orb of imposition to impose a penalty to saving throws, the affected creature takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your orb's enhancement bonus when it successfully saves against the effect.

section.name: Staff of Defense:
section.text: When you use your staff of defense, if the triggering attack was is a melee attack, you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
If the triggering attack is not a melee attack, the attacking creature takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your staff's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Tome of Binding:
section.text: When you use your tome of binding, the creatures summoned by the affected power gain the following triggered action:

section.name: Death Burst
section.text: (Lightning)

section.name: Trigger (nonaction interrupt):
section.text: The creature is reduced to 0 hit points or less

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Enemies adjacent to the creature take lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your tome's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Tome of Readiness:
section.text: When you use your tome of readiness, you can change the tome spell's the damage type and keyword to lightning instead of its normal type.

section.name: Wand of Accurace:
section.text: When you use your wand of accuracy, the target of the triggering attack roll takes additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier from the triggering attack.
If the triggering attack has the Lightning keyword, the bonus increases to 3 + your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Force Orb
power.fluff: You hurl an orb of magical force and when it bursts against the target, it throws off razor-sharp shards of force that cut nearby enemies

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature or object in the center square

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You knock the primary target prone.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
If the primary attack was a miss, the primary target is also a secondary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

power.title: Glorious Presence
power.fluff: Radiant moonlight streams from you in all directions, and those who behold you are stricken with awe

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target half the distance.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with the first attack it makes.

power.title: Grasping Shadows
power.fluff: At your command, shadows reach out to grab your foes, and wreath the area in darkness

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of writhing shadows until the end of your next turn.
Targets of the attack treat the zone as difficult terrain.
An enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Icy Terrain
power.fluff: You coat the ground with treacherous ice that freezes and hampers your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is prone

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage, and the target grants combat advantage for the first attack against it.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You knock the target prone after the zone has been created.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of icy ground until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain for creatures that do not have at least resist 10 cold or icewalk.
If a creature falls prone in the zone, it takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Illusory Obstacles
power.fluff: The image of treacherous terrain appears in the minds of your enemies, disorienting them

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target cannot charge, and cannot target squares or creatures that are more than 5 squares away from it.

power.title: Incendiary Detonation
power.fluff: Gouts of flame pulse from your implement and explode amid your enemies, setting the area alight and roasting them as they attempt to escape

part.keyword: Arcane, Evocation, Fire, Force, Implement, Zone

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of licking flames until the end of your next turn.

A creature that ends a movement or its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Orb of Deception:
section.text: You can expend your orb of deception as part of using this power to make enemies unaware of the zone. They become aware of the zone once a creature takes the damage from it.

section.name: Orb of Imposition:
section.text: You can use your orb of imposition as sustain the zone, as though it were a 1st-level at-will attack.
If you do, the zone expands to a burst 2.

section.name: Staff of Defense:
section.text: When you use your staff of defense before the end of the encounter, the triggering enemy takes fire and force damage equal to your Constitution modifier + implement's enhancement bonus. If the triggering attack was a melee attack, you push the enemy 2 squares.

section.name: Tome of Binding:
section.text: Creatures you summon are immune to the effects of the zone.

section.name: Tome of Readiness:
section.text: If your tome spell has the Fire or Force keyword, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with it until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Wand of Accuracy:
section.text: The zone only affects enemies.

power.title: Leaden Transformation
power.fluff: You send a bolt of energy toward your enemy, painfully turning its legs into blocks of lead

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Ray of Enfeeblement
power.fluff: You point three fingers at your foe, curling them like talons, and a weird green mist streams its flesh, carrying away its strength

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligenve vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is weakened for the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Skewering Spikes
power.fluff: You call forth floating spikes of metal and stone that rapidly streak toward your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One, two, or three creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, or 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage if you target only one creature.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Twilight Falls
power.fluff: You weave draining shadow energy into an oppressive gloom that dims your enemies' senses
